Articles.Content:
The "Well Travelled" Palin kerman challenge thread.pt1.

This is a very simple challenge at first sight. 

Show us a screenshot of the astronaut complex hovering over your most experienced tourist showing their log.        

100pts=Said tourist is safe back at ksc.

100pts=Per xp point(NOT stars!)

-200=Tourist is assigned

-500pts=Tourist is lost/missing

open to suggestions, of course two leaderboards - modded and stock will be posted here, screenshots and videos are cool and Wheatons law overides any previously mentioned rules. 

so far my best is 400

Edited November 8, 2016 by Palaceviking
Sorting
